Title: FileReader duplicate IDs
Description: Filereader not removing all lines with duplicate IDs
Expected results: No duplicate IDs in participant list
Comments: Fixed by reducing index by 1 whenever a line is removed from the participant arraylist.

Title: DB connection problem
Description: Once GameView is executed, the Driver class will connect to DB automatically; the message shows that it is successfully read data from DB/File, but could not get any participant list information to do the next step.
Expected results: Be able to get the participant lists when the application is executed.
Device: Windows PC Asus Generic/All Windows 7 Chrome Latest
Comments: Fix: results table was not being dropped at initialisation resulting in error by trying to create it again. Added drop result table statement.

Title: Get exception while executing game to display game result
Description: After selecting the referee and athletes to start the game, it would show error message(NullPointerException)
Expected results: Should not have NullPointerException at this stage.
Device: Windows PC Asus Generic/All Windows 7 Chrome Latest
Comments: Remove Official class - setResultTopList method write File and DB feature

Title: Game result history table cannot display the game type string
Description: Click the Game Result History button to view the information table, the Game Type column data is empty.
Device: Windows PC Asus Generic/All Windows 7 Chrome Latest
